ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards]  Charming
ygData.msgSnippet: Remember also that you can hit F1 twice to select your pet and use F8 to get the nearest mob (or have an assist hotkey).  I haven t gotten to charm level yet,
ygData.messageBody:
Remember also that you can hit F1 twice to select your pet and use F8 to get
the nearest mob (or have an assist hotkey). I haven't gotten to charm level
yet, but I have been reading lots about the topic!

Gilgurth
Bard of 24 Winces
E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 31, 2000 12:33 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Charming


you don't have to switch targets if you are doing party buff songs as the
off songs. altho i was able to also do charm, switch, chant, chant, switch
back,
charm with little or no problems.

At 12:56 PM 5/31/00 -0400, you wrote:
>With that technique, you have to keep switching targets rights? That is
>the problem I was having, switching targets and weaving the songs...
>
